title: Software Developer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Chicanos Por La Causa in Jan 2023
Interview Descriptions: The process was prompt, well communicated, and the environment was welcoming. I had an hour long behavioral interview with classic questions. Technical interview consisted of High Level design scenario questions, and additional questions relating to comprehension of database commands, etc.
Interview Questions: How would you explain object oriented programming to an adult who didn't work as a software engineer.

title: Promoter Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Chicanos Por La Causa (Tucson, AZ)
Interview Descriptions: Interview - straight to the point about position&related questions. BUT I didn’t like that they never emailed me about not getting the position. Waited wks for response. Unprofessional. There were two interviewers, they were non-supervisors, supervisors double booked their schedules and instead of rescheduling the interview. The whole hiring process made me really uninterested in the company.
Interview Questions: What are your strengths and weaknesses?

title: Education Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Chicanos Por La Causa (San Antonio, TX) in Jul 2021
Interview Descriptions: The interview process took about one hour. They asked a variety of questions relating to mentoring and instances where I had to teach students and adults new curriculum.  They also asked if I have ever been in a position working with difficult people.
Interview Questions: Name an instance where you taught a colleague a new system?

title: Parent Educator Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Chicanos Por La Causa (Tempe, AZ) in Feb 2019
Interview Descriptions: Got call for interview, set date and time, had interview at their center. Interview was done with both supervisor of center and manager. They tag team the interview and gave a paper with questions to be to look over before they asked the interview questions.
Interview Questions: How would I retain a resistant family?

title: Project Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Chicanos Por La Causa (Phoenix, AZ) in Dec 2013
Interview Descriptions: Easy. They were in need of a project coordinator I vsited the office and the manager and another project coordinator interviewed me. We realized I was a fit for their needs.
Interview Questions: How much experience I had in a similar position?
